alert.note: Alert for Dare (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 6:28PM EDT until June 13 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Dare County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 627 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grandy, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kill Devil Hills, Southern Shores, Sanderling, Colington, Duck Coe Pier, Wright Brothers National Monument and Avalon Pier. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
